name: Project Centauri
description:
Project Centauri

As you travel to find a new home for a near extinct species you reach Alpha Centauri. A safe haven from the zemulons a fierce warrior species but as you arrive to take this home as your own you the native population protect themselves from an invasion of there home world.

Game play

This game features a survival like aspect of protecting yourself from the zemulons. As you progress the rounds get harder but give the potential to upgrade your ship, what you choose decides you fate.

Features

-Unlock new ships
-Upgrade current ships
